tool.name: Channel Network
tool.description: This tool derives a channel network based on gridded digital elevation data.<br/>Use the initiation options to determine under which conditions channels shall start.<br/><br/>

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: A grid that contains elevation data.

param.name: SINKROUTE
param.label: Flow Direction
param.help: An optional grid that provides information about flow directions. <br/>Values between 1 to 8 force the flow of a cell to be given to one its adjacent neighbor cells (1->NE, 2->E, 3->SE, 4->S, 5->SW, 6->W, 7->NW, 8->N). In case of other values the algorithm will use its own routing scheme. <br/>This option is in particular useful to supply the algorithm with routes that lead the flow through closed depression.

param.name: INIT_GRID
param.label: Initiation Grid
param.help: Dependent on the chosen 'Initiation Type' and 'Initiation Threshold' the values of this grid control where a channel is initiated.

param.name: INIT_METHOD
param.label: Initiation Type
param.help: Options:<br/> - Less than<br/> - Equals<br/> - Greater than<br/>Controls under which condition a channel is initiated.

param.name: INIT_VALUE
param.label: Initiation Threshold
param.help: Dependent on the chosen 'Initiation Grid' and 'Initiation Type' this value controls under which condition a channel is initiated.

param.name: DIV_CELLS
param.label: Tracing: Max. Divergence
param.help: Tracing: Stop after x cells with divergent flow
